snippets.name: EAD receipt notice received
snippets.text: Received and reviewed EAD application receipt notice. Category: {cursor}.  Confirmed client's name, DOB, and A# are correct. Scanned to client's digital file.
snippets.html: Received and reviewed EAD application receipt notice. Category: {cursor}. Confirmed client's name, DOB, and A# are correct. Scanned to client's digital file.

snippets.name: EAD application notice of filing - autoextension DOES apply
snippets.text: Prepared notice of filing of EAD renewal application, EAD automatic extension during pendency of application informational flyer, and original receipt notice for client. Mailed to client via USPS first class mail and posted to Clio for Clients portal.
snippets.html: Prepared notice of filing of EAD renewal application, EAD automatic extension during pendency of application informational flyer, and original receipt notice for client. Mailed to client via USPS first class mail and posted to Clio for Clients portal.

snippets.name: EAD application notice of filing - autoextension DOES NOT apply

snippets.name: EAD application notice of filing - initial C08 (asylum applicant) EAD application
snippets.text: Prepared notice of filing of initial asylum applicant EAD application and information flyer for client re expectation of receiving EAD card in 30 days.  Mailed to client via USPS first class mail and posted to Clio for Clients portal.
snippets.html: Prepared notice of filing of initial asylum applicant EAD application and information flyer for client re expectation of receiving EAD card in 30 days. Mailed to client via USPS first class mail and posted to Clio for Clients portal.

snippets.name: Attorney review and approved EAD application
snippets.text: I reviewed and approved client(s) EAD application(s) for filing with USCIS. Notified case assistant and routed for filing by mail.
snippets.html: I reviewed and approved client(s) EAD application(s) for filing with USCIS. Notified case assistant and routed for filing by mail.

snippets.name: I-589 forms prep appt (KMC)
snippets.text:
Appoint with client to prepare asylum application form (I-589). Discussed next steps.{key: tab}
1-Confirmed client reviewed biographical information (pp. 1-4) with case assistant.
2-Prepared reminder of form.
3-Sight translated substantive portions of claim to client
4-Discussed possibly filing skeletal application vs. filing a complete application and pros/cons (faster work permit vs. possibly not being ready if we get a quick interview).
5-Gave overview of next steps (declaration drafting, psych eval, and corroborating evidence)
snippets.html:
Appoint with client to prepare asylum application form (I-589). Discussed next steps.{key: tab}

1-Confirmed client reviewed biographical information (pp. 1-4) with case assistant.

2-Prepared reminder of form.

3-Sight translated substantive portions of claim to client

4-Discussed possibly filing skeletal application vs. filing a complete application and pros/cons (faster work permit vs. possibly not being ready if we get a quick interview).

5-Gave overview of next steps (declaration drafting, psych eval, and corroborating evidence)
